entries.title: FDA says it will greenlight pharmacies to fill prescriptions for abortion pill
entries.description: The FDA is relaxing the rules on the abortion pill mifepristone, saying pharmacies can now fill prescriptions for the drug so long as they become certified to do so.

entries.title: Cruise ships save dozens of migrants near Florida Keys
entries.description: Two cruise lines rescued dozens of people on small boats near Cuba on Monday, the latest incident of migrants trying to reach the U.S. through the Florida Keys.

entries.title: Officer charged in fatal crash that killed 2 high school cheerleaders
entries.description: A Louisiana police officer who killed two high school cheerleaders in a car crash while in pursuit of a suspect has been charged with homicide.

entries.title: US men's coach Berhalter admits kicking future wife in 1991
entries.description: The U.S. Soccer Federation is investigating men’s national team coach Gregg Berhalter for a 1991 confrontation in which he kicked the woman who later became his wife

entries.title: LA County to pay $20M for Black family’s seized land
entries.description: Southern California beachfront property that was taken from a Black couple through eminent domain a century ago and returned to their heirs last year will be sold back to Los Angeles County for nearly $20 million

entries.title: Tesla shares tumble after company misses delivery target
entries.description: Shares of Tesla tumbled more than 12% Tuesday, the first full day of trading since the company announced 2022 delivery numbers that fell short of targets

entries.title: WATCH:  Watch hilarious moment grandma messes up ‘Bad Romance’ lyrics
entries.description: "Caught in a fence!" Grandma stole the show during this family’s attempt at singing Lady Gaga’s hit "Bad Romance."

entries.title: State to become 1st to execute trans person in US
entries.description: Amber McLaughlin is set to be the first trans person to be executed in the U.S. and the first person executed in 2023, according to Death Penalty Information Center.

entries.title: Utah ski resort employee is ejected from chairlift, dies
entries.description: An employee at a Utah ski resort has died after being ejected from a chairlift whose line was severed by a fallen tree amid record snowfall

entries.title: Bills-Bengals won't resume game this week, Week 18 unchanged
entries.description: The NFL has informed the Bills and Bengals their suspended game will not be resumed this week while the Week 18 schedule remains unchanged

entries.title: Germany refuses WWII reparations talks, Poland turns to UN
entries.description: Poland says it has been informed by Germany that it does not intend to engage in negotiations on any World War II reparations as Berlin considers the matter closed

entries.title: Video game workers form Microsoft's 1st labor union
entries.description: A group of video game testers is forming Microsoft’s first labor union in the U.S. It will also be the largest union in the video game industry

entries.title: Mega Millions starts new year with estimated $785 million jackpot
entries.description: The Mega Millions jackpot stands at an estimated $785 million ahead of Tuesday night's drawing.

entries.title: Suspect sought after hit-and-run crash at restaurant leaves 22 injured
entries.description: A car crashed into the Inwood Bar and Grill on Monday injuring 22 people after it was hit by another driver who fled the scene.

entries.title: WATCH:  Little boy gives dad advice on dealing with anxiety
entries.description: Five-year-old Hudson had some sound wisdom to share with his dad.

entries.title: New Congress live updates: McCarthy teases GOP 'battle' over House speaker vote
entries.description: The next House speaker will be elected before the new Congress is sworn in, with Republicans in the House majority and Democrats in the Senate majority.

entries.title: US Virgin Islands fires attorney general in Epstein cases
entries.description: The governor of the U.S. Virgin Islands has fired the attorney general of the U.S. territory who led a lengthy legal case against disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein that resulted in a $105 million settlement

entries.title: WATCH:  Healthier eating habits for the New Year
entries.description: Nutrition and fitness expert and NY Times best-selling author JJ Virgin discusses what it means to eat healthy along with tips and tricks to help you keep track of your New Year’s resolutions.

entries.title: NTSB: Airline worker pulled into engine in fatal accident
entries.description: Authorities say an airline ground crew worker was pulled into the engine of a plane during a fatal accident at an Alabama airport

entries.title: Fake teen doctor, now 25, sentenced to prison for new scam
entries.description: A serial grifter who gained national infamy as a teenager when he impersonated a doctor to defraud a patient is heading back to prison after pleading guilty to stealing more than $10,000 from his employer

entries.title: $785M Mega Millions prize is 6th largest in US history
entries.description: An estimated $785 million Mega Millions jackpot will give lottery players a chance to start the new year with a lucrative bang

entries.title: Police say 22 injured when SUV crashes into NYC restaurant
entries.description: Police say a hit-and-run driver rear-ended a sport utility vehicle and sent it crashing into a New York City restaurant, injuring 22 people

entries.title: Israeli ultranationalist minister visits Jerusalem holy site
entries.description: An ultranationalist Israeli Cabinet minister has visited a flashpoint Jerusalem holy site for the first time since taking office in Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s new far-right government last week

entries.title: German doctor jailed for illegally issuing mask exemptions
entries.description: A German doctor was sentenced late Monday to two years and nine months in prison for illegally issuing more than 4,000 people with exemptions from wearing masks during the coronavirus pandemic

entries.title: FTX crypto CEO Sam Bankman-Fried expected to plead not guilty in court Tuesday
entries.description: Disgraced crypto executive Sam Bankman-Fried is likely to plead not guilty to an eight-count fraud and conspiracy indictment on Tuesday, a source said.

entries.title: Idaho murders: Suspect to appear in court as he faces charges over college killings
entries.description: Bryan Kohberger, 28, is set to appear in court hearing Tuesday as he faces charges over the November murders of four University of Idaho students.

entries.title: Transgender Missouri inmate scheduled to be executed Tuesday
entries.description: Nearly 1,600 death row inmates have been put to death in the U.S. since 1977, but an execution scheduled for Tuesday in Missouri would be the first involving a transgender woman

entries.title: Brazil prepares to bury Pelé in city he made soccer mecca
entries.description: Forty-five years after Pelé played his last game, it’s hard to imagine modern soccer or Brazil without him

entries.title: Pro rally driver Ken Block dies in snowmobile accident
entries.description: Pro rally driver Ken Block died in a snowmobile accident Monday.

entries.title: Buffalo Bills' safety Damar Hamlin in critical condition after collapsing on field
entries.description: Buffalo Bills' safety Damar Hamlin collapsed after making a tackle in the first quarter against the Bengals in Cincinnati.

entries.title: Tornado watch in effect for parts of Texas and Louisiana, thunderstorms to develop
entries.description: Multiple homes were damaged in Arkansas after a possible tornado passed through the area, according to law enforcement officials.

entries.title: Suspect sought after 1 police officer fatally shot, another injured
entries.description: An hourslong search for a suspect ended with "shooting incidents," authorities said.

entries.title: Earth, Wind & Fire drummer Fred White dies at age 67
entries.description: Drummer Fred White, who backed up his brothers Maurice and Verdine White on the hitmaking ensemble Earth, Wind & Fire, has died

entries.title: McCarthy struggles to clinch support to be House speaker, with hours to go
entries.description: House GOP leader Kevin McCarthy is still struggling to clinch the necessary support to become the next speaker
